customer_name: SeaQuest Interactive Aquarium Fort Worth LLC
customer_addr:
1974 Green Oaks Road

site_name: SeaQuest Interactive Aquarium Fort Worth LLC

citations.narrative:
The otter back holding area had an accumulation of grime along the edges of the floor and up the walls. Grime can be a
breeding ground for bacteria, mold, and allergens which could possibly cause illness in the animals. The otter holding
area should be deep cleaned as often as necessary to prevent the contamination of the animals, minimize disease
hazards, and reduce odors.
To be corrected by: Oct 16, 2023

The kitchen/food preparation area was filthy. This area is used for all the animals at the facility. There was a large amount
of clutter throughout the room. The bottom shelf of one of the prep tables was covered in rust with at least one hole rusted
through the shelf. The floor did not appear to have been cleaned in a very long time. Dirty food prep areas are ideal
environments for attracting pests and contributing to airborne germs that can contaminate food and cause illness in the
animals. Rusty surfaces cannot be adequately cleaned and disinfected. Premises shall be kept clean and in good repair
to protect the animals from injury and to facilitate prescribed husbandry practices.
To be corrected by: Oct 16, 0223
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n
